com.sing.datetimepicker.date

类 DatePickerDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • com.sing.datetimepicker.date.DatePickerDialog
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, DatePickerController

    public class DatePickerDialog
extends android.app.DialogFragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, DatePickerController
    Dialog allowing users to select a date.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  DatePickerDialog.OnDateChangedListener
      The callback used to notify other date picker components of a change in selected date.
      static interface  DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
      The callback used to indicate the user is done filling in the date.

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 android.app.Fragment

        android.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, android.app.Fragment.SavedState

    • 字段概要

      • newInstance

        public static DatePickerDialog newInstance(DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener callBack,
                                           int year,
                                           int monthOfYear,
                                           int dayOfMonth)
        参数:
        callBack - How the parent is notified that the date is set.
        year - The initial year of the dialog.
        monthOfYear - The initial month of the dialog.
        dayOfMonth - The initial day of the dialog.

      • setMinDate

        public void setMinDate(java.util.Calendar calendar)
        Sets the minimal date supported by this DatePicker. Dates before (but not including) the specified date will be disallowed from being selected.
        参数:
        calendar - a Calendar object set to the year, month, day desired as the mindate.

      • getMinDate

        public java.util.Calendar getMinDate()
        返回:
        The minimal date supported by this DatePicker. Null if it has not been set.

      • setMaxDate

        public void setMaxDate(java.util.Calendar calendar)
        Sets the minimal date supported by this DatePicker. Dates after (but not including) the specified date will be disallowed from being selected.
        参数:
        calendar - a Calendar object set to the year, month, day desired as the maxdate.

      • getMaxDate

        public java.util.Calendar getMaxDate()
        返回:
        The maximal date supported by this DatePicker. Null if it has not been set.

      • setHighlightedDays

        public void setHighlightedDays(java.util.Calendar[] highlightedDays)
        Sets an array of dates which should be highlighted when the picker is drawn
        参数:
        highlightedDays - an Array of Calendar objects containing the dates to be highlighted

      • getHighlightedDays

        public java.util.Calendar[] getHighlightedDays()
        指定者:
        getHighlightedDays 在接口中 DatePickerController
        返回:
        The list of dates, as Calendar Objects, which should be highlighted. null is no dates should be highlighted

      • setSelectableDays

        public void setSelectableDays(java.util.Calendar[] selectableDays)
        Sets a list of days which are the only valid selections. Setting this value will take precedence over using setMinDate() and setMaxDate()
        参数:
        selectableDays - an Array of Calendar Objects containing the selectable dates

      • getSelectableDays

        public java.util.Calendar[] getSelectableDays()
        返回:
        an Array of Calendar objects containing the list with selectable items. null if no restriction is set

      • setDisabledDays

        public void setDisabledDays(java.util.Calendar[] disabledDays)
        Sets a list of days that are not selectable in the picker Setting this value will take precedence over using setMinDate() and setMaxDate(), but stacks with setSelectableDays()
        参数:
        disabledDays - an Array of Calendar Objects containing the disabled dates

      • getDisabledDays

        public java.util.Calendar[] getDisabledDays()
        返回:
        an Array of Calendar objects containing the list of days that are not selectable. null if no restriction is set

      • isOutOfRange

        public boolean isOutOfRange(int year,
                            int month,
                            int day)
        指定者:
        isOutOfRange 在接口中 DatePickerController
        返回:
        true if the specified year/month/day are within the selectable days or the range set by minDate and maxDate. If one or either have not been set, they are considered as Integer.MIN_VALUE and Integer.MAX_VALUE.
